headline.main: BRITISH GET PLANES FLOWN FROM U.S.; Beaverbrook Asserts 'Steady Stream' of Bombers Is Now Crossing the Atlantic BRITISH GET PLANES FLOWN FROM U.S.

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Jan. 2 -- Lord Beaverbrook, Minister of Aircraft Production, today announced that United States bombers are being flown across the Atlantic "in a steady stream."
abstract: Lord Beaverbrook repts plane deliveries by air; lauds quality; Brit press scores failure to locate machine tool shipment
snippet: LONDON, Jan. 2 -- Lord Beaverbrook, Minister of Aircraft Production, today announced that United States bombers are being flown across the Atlantic "in a steady stream."...
